meanings.sent1: The reservers of the seats arrived early to secure their spots.
meanings.sent2: The reservers at the restaurant called ahead to book a table.
meanings.sent3: The reservers of the last piece of cake were the lucky ones at the party.
meanings.sent4: She was like a reserver of memories, always keeping special moments close.
meanings.sent5: The diligent reservers of library books never missed their favorite titles.

meanings.definition: A group of people who reserve something.
meanings.sent1: The reservers for the event formed a line outside the venue.
meanings.sent2: The reservers for the conference filled up the available slots quickly.
meanings.sent3: The reservers of the best seats cheered together at the concert.
meanings.sent4: The reservers of the meeting room were like a well-organized team.
meanings.sent5: The reservers of the parking spaces avoided the hassle of finding a spot later.

meanings.sent1: The reservers of the hotel rooms confirmed their bookings in advance.
meanings.sent2: The reservers of the equipment signed up early for their slots.
meanings.sent3: The reservers of the limited edition item were thrilled to secure theirs.
meanings.sent4: Her habit of reserving time for herself was like a gift of self-care.
meanings.sent5: The reservers of the study rooms enjoyed a quiet place to focus on their work.
